queries.select: SELECT s.idsaldoccorrente, s.idccorrente, s.causale, s.data, s.movimento, s.saldo, s.note , c.nroccorrente, c.note as noteccorrente --, u.idutente, u.nome as utente, u.note as desutente from saldoccorrente s join ccorrente c on c.idccorrente = s.idccorrente --left join utenti u on u.idutente = s.idutente where s.idccorrente = {@qrykey='idcc'} and ('{@qrypar='neg'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='neg'}' = '1' and s.movimento < 0)) and ('{@qrypar='pos'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='pos'}' = '1' and s.movimento > 0)) and ('{@qrypar='from'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='from'}' <> '' and s.data >= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='from'}', 112))) and ('{@qrypar='to'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='to'}' <> '' and s.data <= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='to'}', 112)))
